title: The picture a tragæcomædie : as it was often presented with good allowance, at the Globe, and Blackefriers play-houses, by the Kings Maiesties seruants / written by Philip Massinger.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I.N. for Thomas Walkley and are to be sould at his shoppe at the Eagle and Child in Brittains burse,
